review_text: We came for the Bridge to bridge race and this was the perfect place one block from the start. The apartment was quaint and cute and had what we needed. The walls are very thin and could hear the neighbors and outside easily.

Cute apartment in great location in downtown Georgetown. Great sushi restaurant right downstairs and lots of cute cafes, bars and shops nearby. I was there for a wedding and it was perfect for my needs. Very comfortable and safe.

We had a wonderful time. The place is extremely convenient and centrally located. Every restaurant and bar and town was easily walkable. We appreciated the local recommendations on things to do! Will definitely be back.

Georgetown is an extremely walkable town. We parked the car and left it there...restaurants, bars, Harbourwalk, museums, shops, the beautiful streets...all very short walks away.
Bring your own toiletries and ice...and because other folk mentioned these items, we were prepared.
Not a big apartment, just perfect for 2.
A "walk-up" on the 2nd floor...11 steps...a landing...plus 13 steps.
Clean. Comfortable. Cozy.

Awesome efficiency apartment in downtown. All main restaurants and coffee shops are walkable. Residents of the two neighboring apartments were quiet. I knew there was going to be 700+ extra people in town (I was one of them in town for the event) and parking downtown near the apartment was still super easy. Street patrons did get a bit loud at sunset but when I came time to call it a night it got all quiet. Your directly above the restaurant but you barely hear a thing even at its busiest times. Will definitely see if it's available for next time visits.
Great location walk to everything, private and clean. Will stay again.
The location is just perfect! Great space, nicely done. We would definitely stay here again!

My husband and I needed a relaxing weekend away and this was perfect! We did not have to drive anywhere! Everywhere we wanted to be was in walking distance. The apartment was very comfortable and the neighbors were very friendly! We can't wait to book our next stay!

Beautiful furnishings and very comfortable bedding and linens. All about the location and balcony. No shampoo or soap for shower like most, so just be prepared for that but not a big deal. Host was very accommodating! Would recommend and will book again!

Fantastic historic apartment in the heart of Georgetown! I loved the quaint downtown area and able to walk everywhere. Perfect for a quiet weekend getaway. Place was just as described! As others mentioned it is loud at night with city noise and no black out curtains. Bed is super comfy, but if want to sleep in bring ear plugs and night mask üòÅ. Great location! Convenient to main street and tours. Great job keeping the old architecture with current furnishings.
Thanks Victoria!

Victoria was responsive from the moment we booked & throughout our stay. It was easy to find & easy to get in. The unit was clean & fresh- nicely decorated, renovated, & charming. Loved the location & nostalgia of the building but, we did have some pain points. The birds would perch on the balcony and start chirping at 5:00am. With the bed placed against the window, they're basically chirping right above your head. The bedroom lacked black out curtains, so if the birds didn't wake you, the sunrise will. The linens were clean, pillows plush, but the bed was squeaky. Anytime either one of us would rollover it would wake the other. No shampoo, conditioner, body soap, or a blow dryer. The trash comes Saturday at 7:00am. A restaurant is directly below the unit- the noises weren't too bad. From time to time you'd hear clanging from the kitchen cleaning up at the end of the night & then prepping in the morning for the day. No designated parking made it hard to find parking from time to time.
Perfect space for a weekend getaway!! Everything was nearby and the apartment was beautiful!!
I highly recommend this place

we had the best anniversary getaway. her place is within walking distance to so many nice restaurants.
